long_description: The REI Connect Tech Garage is much more than a simple vestibule. This pole-supported, dual-door/dual-awning garage provides sun and weather protection, extends storage and expands entry/exit points. REI Connect Tech Garage is compatible with 2011 Hobitat 4, 6 and Kingdom 8 tents and 2012 Kingdom 4, 6 and 8 tents (all sold separately) which feature a Connect Tech zipper. Adds 56.1 sq. ft. of vestibule space; dimensions are 100 x 80 in. Provides convenient, weatherproof storage and entry and exit. Doors can be poled out (tent poles and trekking poles sold separately) to create awnings. Doors can also be rolled all the way up, half way up or diagonally half way up and secured. Made from durable, waterproof polyester which sags less than nylon during weather fluctuations. Connect Tech Garage attaches securely to tent via Connect Tech zipper. Includes storage/carry sack and 4 stakes.
short_description: The REI Connect Tech Garage is much more than a simple vestibule. This pole-supported, dual-door/dual-awning garage provides sun and weather protection, extends storage and expands entry/exit points.
